# Academic and Extra-Curricular Data Integration

**Description:**
Integrate academic results with extra-curricular activity data for each student. This will allow the system to provide a holistic view of student performance and enable identification of meritorious students based on both academics and activities.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Store academic results alongside extra-curricular participation for each student.
- Update data model to support both types of data.
- Display combined performance in the UI.
- Enable future analytics for identifying high-achieving students.

**Benefits:**
- More comprehensive student profiles.
- Supports recognition and resource allocation for well-rounded students.
